summary: A command‑line utility that builds, trains, and evaluates a Deep Generative Model of Graphs (DGMG) using PyTorch. It handles argument parsing, dataset loading, model instantiation, optimizer setup, a single‑sample training loop with gradient clipping, periodic validation, checkpoint saving, and optional graph generation for inference.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to reproduce the DGMG approach from the cited paper, experiment with graph generation models, and integrate the training pipeline into their own graph‑learning workflows.
